page.title: 13INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: This industrial estate is situated on the north-east side of Trowbridge. It was developed in the late 1960's on the site of the old brickworks. The land here poorly drained clay and not very productive from an agricultural point of view. Development in this area was basically that of distributing industries and warehouses, some of whom opened distribution centres for the whole of the south of England during the late 60's and early 70's. Volkswagen, one of the largest companies involved, later sold their premises to Airsprung, a local bedding manufacturer, who already had a large site on the opposite side of the road. Today, this firm owns the largest area on the estate.
